com.couponproject.dao

Interface CustomerDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CustomerDBDAO

    public interface CustomerDAO
    This interface provides a list of C.R.U.D methods that can be performed on and with a Customer Bean
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Avi Huly and Orit Blum

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void createCustomer(Customer custumer)
      Creates a new Customer in a Database with the parameters of the given customer bean instance
      java.util.Collection<Customer> getAllCustomer()
      Returns a Collection of all the Customer instances
      java.util.Collection<Coupon> getCoupons(long id)
      Returns a Collection of all Coupon instances of a specific Customer instance
      Customer getCustomer(long id)
      Returns an instance of a Bean Customer based on a giver Cutomer's ID
      Customer getCustomer(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String password)
      Returns an instance of a Bean Customer based on a giver Cutomer's Name and Password
      boolean login(java.lang.String custNmae, java.lang.String password)
      Returns a boolean indicating a successful login or not based on customer's given name and password as argument
      void removeCustomer(Customer custumer)
      Removes a Customer from the Database with the parameters of the given customer bean instance
      void updateCustomer(Customer custumer)
      Updates a Customer in the Database with the parameters of the given customer bean instance

      • login

        boolean login(java.lang.String custNmae,
              java.lang.String password)
       throws CouponSystemException
        Returns a boolean indicating a successful login or not based on customer's given name and password as argument
        Parameters:
        custNmae - Customer's Name
        password - Customer's Password
        Returns:
        true for successful login and false for unsuccessful login
        Throws:
        CouponSystemException
